function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Rapid capture of varied information from the environment","Impact":"Increased risk of capturing and spreading contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Implement strict hygiene protocols and regular disinfection of data capture devices","Technologies":"IoT sensors, contactless data collection, and remote monitoring systems","People":"Customers, patients, doctors, researchers, drug makers","Owner":"Business owners, healthcare institutions, research facilities"},{"Description":"Millions of data points pouring in from various sources","Impact":"Potential for cross-contamination and spread of diseases through data collection","Mitigation":"Use advanced data encryption and secure data transmission protocols","Technologies":"Blockchain, encryption algorithms, secure data communication protocols","People":"Customers, patients, doctors, researchers, drug makers","Owner":"Technology companies, data management teams"},{"Description":"ML and AI algorithms distilling data into relevant knowledge for better customer service","Impact":"Possibility of overlooking disease-related data patterns that could indicate a health risk","Mitigation":"Implement a dual analysis system that accounts for health-related data patterns alongside customer service data","Technologies":"Health data analytics, anomaly detection algorithms, AI for healthcare","People":"Customers, patients, doctors, researchers, drug makers","Owner":"AI development teams, healthcare institutions"}]}
